data.title: Heavy snowfall disrupts travel in Switzerland and Germany
data.meta_description: Bad weather conditions in Switzerland and southern Germany disrupted travel, with hundreds of flights delayed or canceled so far.
data.text:
This news story has been written and carefully fact-checked by an external editorial team. At SWI swissinfo.ch we select the most relevant news for an international audience and use automatic translation tools such as DeepL to translate it into English. Providing you with automatically translated news gives us the time to write more in-depth articles. You can find them here.

If you want to know more about how we work, have a look here, and if you have feedback on this news story please write to english@swissinfo.ch.
